original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2536)@</color>召喚8個血色刀輪，以武將為中心，往四面八方飛出，以<color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(2536)@</color><color=#80cc00>武力</color>對敵人造成物理傷害。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2536)@</color> Summon 8 Scarlet Sword Wheels, with military forces as the center, flying out in all directions, color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(2536)@</color><color=#80cc00>War</color> causes physical damage to the enemy.
